lead_paragraph: WEINRIB--Jay. The Berger Family's lifelong friend. "Uncle Jay" always made us laugh! The world has lost a special man. Our condolences to Paulette, Madeline, Lena and Bunny. Love, Leslie, Brad, Greg, Karen and families 1/3
